thread.title: Snow plow driver shot in Verdun | CTV Montreal News
thread.title_full: Snow plow driver shot in Verdun | CTV Montreal News

author: CTV Montreal
title: Snow plow driver shot in Verdun | CTV Montreal News
text:
The driver of a snow plow was shot in Verdun on Wednesday afternoon.
Montreal police said the attack happened on Gordon St. south of Bannantyne Ave. around 4:30 p.m.
Officers rushed to the scene and so far have only confirmed the man was in the vehicle when he was struck.
The shooting victim was rushed to hospital and he is expected to survive. The severity of his injuries is not known.
 
This article will be updated
